# solana_random_keypair (Resource)



## Example Usage


## Schema

### Optional

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.

### Read-Only

- **private_key** (String, Sensitive) The randomly generated private key.
- **public_key** (String) The randomly generated public key.
